sub_title: Technical Solution Architect / Java Chapter Lead at Rabobank
summary:
•	Over 16 years of experience in all parts of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) developing applications using Java/JEE, SQL, Agile, DevOps in Banking and Financial Services domain
•	Expertise in analysis, design, development, testing and maintenance of large scale object oriented applications
•	Experience in Angular, nodejs and building single page applications
•	Certified Scrum Master and Certified Full stack developer
•	Experience in Designing and Developing Spring boot applications, Microservices and leading the Cloud migration(Cloud Foundry + Azure)
•	Expertise in TDD, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery

awards.title: Cognizant Project of the Year 2009
awards.description: Special Asset Management System was selected as the Cognizant Project of the Year 2009.

profile_positions.description:
Technical Solution Architect :
Redesigning the financing request journey

Java Chapter Lead :
Lead, develop and mentor Java chapter members by focusing on craftsmanship, improving and sharing the Way of Work, and creating high performing squads.

Java Guild Core Member :
To increase the speed and quality of the software delivery, defining standards and guidelines, bring innovation, consultancy and support for teams

profile_positions.title: Lead Developer / Java Chapter Lead / Java Guild

profile_positions.description:
• Lead Full Stack Java Developer, developing the Cloud Native Springboot applications and leading the Cloud migration(PCF + Azure) for all the Java applications. Lead for the Legacy App decommissioning
• Designing and Developing Angular, Spring Boot Cloud Applications and Microservices to calculate provisions
• Designing and Developing Azure DevOps pipelines to deploy in PCF and connect with Azure PostgreSQL
profile_positions.title: Java Lead Full Stack Developer / Java Chapter Lead

profile_positions.description:
Java Lead Full Stack Developer / Java Chapter Lead (Major Dutch Bank) : 

•	Lead Full Stack Java Developer, developing the Cloud Native Springboot applications and leading the Cloud migration(PCF + Azure) for all the Java applications. Lead for the Legacy App decommissioning
•	Designing and Developing Angular, Spring Boot Cloud Applications and Microservices to calculate provisions
•	Designing and Developing Azure DevOps pipelines to deploy in PCF and connect with Azure PostgreSQL
•	Designing and Developing Spring Boot batch applications and Azure serverless functions
•	Create and maintain fully automated Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery using Jenkins, XlDeploy and XlRelease
•	Responsible for test automation using selenium and cucumber.
•	Coaching and Monitoring the colleagues across the Tribe as Java Chapter Lead. Mentoring Java developers across domains on latest Java, Cloud, Angular, Containers, Coding Standards and Automating the CI/CD developments.
profile_positions.title: Java Lead Full Stack Developer / Java Chapter Lead

profile_positions.description:
* Designing and Developing Spring Boot Cloud Native Applications
* Developed an automation test tool with fitnesse and selenium for jenkins continuous integration(Fitnesse, Selenium and Jenkins)
* Involved in forecast application development(Jhipster, AngularJS, Spring Boot) 
* Developed a automatic release notes maven plugin
* Cognizant Idea Champion for 2016
* Cognizant Learning Champion 2017
* Cognizant Innovation Champion 2018
* Participated in various hackathon events
* Acted as a mentor to Junior java developers and automation testers, performing code reviews, offering general support and assistance
* Code Quality is one of the important concerns in Indian IT Services Industry. Participated in the Programming Excellence Program - A program to put developers into path of Programming Craftsmanship.
profile_positions.title: Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Member of an Agile-Scrum team

Senior Developer for Financial Risk Application (Major Dutch Bank) : (2014 March - Present)

* Maintaining Java web application(Java, Spring MVC, Webservice, JPA, SQL, WebSphere, Velocity)
* Created test automation using fitnesse and selenium.
* 3rd Line Production Support

Senior Developer for Financial loan delivery application(Major Dutch Bank) : (2014 March - Present)

* Developing Java REST application and Web application to seperate the product, collateral and liabilties from the Loan application(Java, JMS, Spring MVC, Webservice, JPA, SQL, WebSphere, Angular JS, JQuery)
* Involved in Requirements gathering and Analysis 
* Created test automation using fitnesse and selenium.
* Packaging applications and prepared instructions for Production releases(XLDeploy, XLRelease)
* Code coverage of 99% and excellent code quality(Sonar).
* Using TDD, Continuous integration and the programming best practices
* Working on Dev Ops Model
* 3rd Line Production Support

Senior Developer Special Asset Management System(Major Dutch Bank) : (2014 March - Present)

* Adding new changes to Special Asset Management Java web application(Java, JMS, Spring MVC, Jasper Report, ETL, JQuery, SQL, Hibernate, WebSphere)
* Adding new changes to Monthly Batch application(Java, Spring Batch, SQL, Ibatis, Shell Script)
* 3rd Line Production Support
